Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans are 3-17 in Western Conference games.
The Timberwolves have gone 15-10 against Western Conference opponents.
The Pelicans are shooting 44.2% from the field this season, 1.7 percentage points lower than the 45.9% the Timberwolves allow to opponents.
The Timberwolves average 15.1 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.0 more made shot on average than the 14.1 per game the Pelicans allow.
Top performer Anthony Edwards is averaging 25.6 points, 5.7 rebounds and 4.1 assists for the Timberwolves.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pelicans: 2-8, averaging 113.7 points, 41.5 rebounds, 27.9 assists, 10.0 steals and 5.8 blocks per game while shooting 45.1% from the field. Their opponents have averaged 120.1 points per game.
Timberwolves: 4-6, averaging 107.7 points, 43.9 rebounds, 24.7 assists, 6.4 steals and 4.4 blocks per game while shooting 45.6% from the field. Their opponents have averaged 114.0 points per game.
Others: Pelicans key players: Missi (9.6 points, 8.4 rebounds)
Timberwolves key player: Anthony Edwards (25.6 points, 5.7 rebounds, 4.1 assists)
Pelicans injuries: Brandon Ingram (ankle), Zion Williamson (hamstring), Dejounte Murray (elbow), Karlo Matkovic (back)
